resources.string: To solve quizes that shared with you \nlogin from here
To create quizes for your students \nlogin from here
Write given quiz id to input field below
You unlocked unlimited version of app, now you can take unlimited quiz
There is no quiz id in our database like you provided, please try again !
Wrong answer, please try again to find correct answer
You need to drag and order items
For once please write your fullname here to take quizes !

Create 6 type of Quiz for your students, or enjoy solving quizes with beautiful interface. Hurry ! Your time is valuable for us, come and join Quix family. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=
- You reached end of your free usage limit
- For a cup of coffee price, you can upgrade app
- Only pay 0.99$ and get unlimited access to this awesome app
Are you sure you want to exit from app ?
Time here as minute or leave it empty
Create quizes that can contain max 4 choice and min 2 choice, there should be only one correct answer for each question
Create quizes that can contain max 4 choice and min 2 choice, there should be more than one correct for each question
Create quizes to make student predict missing word or choice
Create quizes to make student place choices for correct order
Create quizes to make student match choices with correct answers
You can not leave quiz name empty
You need to select question type
You can not leave question empty
You can not set more than one question as correct in this question type
At least you need to set one question as correct in this question type
You can not leave match section for choice empty
You need to fill at least 2 choice for question
Are you sure you want to delete this ?
Write general feedback here, this will be shown if your choices do not have feedbacks
Write feedback about this choice here
Write correct match for this choice here

array.name: question_instructions
array.item: Yönerge \n Multiple choice soru tipi nasıl doldurulmalıdır buraya yazacak
Yönerge \n Multiple correct soru tipi nasıl doldurulmalıdır buraya yazacak
Yönerge \n Fill Blank soru tipi nasıl doldurulmalıdır buraya yazacak
Yönerge \n Drag & Order soru tipi nasıl doldurulmalıdır buraya yazacak
Yönerge \n Matching soru tipi nasıl doldurulmalıdır buraya yazacak
Yönerge \n Short Answer soru tipi nasıl doldurulmalıdır buraya yazacak

resources.string: Your results saved and quiz owner can see it now
Add first question to your quiz
Click to learn more information about question evaluation
Congratulations.. This is a very good question. An average question should be correctly answered between 30 and 80 of students.
This question needs revisions. A question correctly answered by less then 30 of students, it means this question is too hard for students.
This question needs revisions. A question correctly answered by more then 80 of students, it means the question is too easy
